discussion.author: joshday
discussion.text: I'm happy to rename, but I also think XML is a ubiquitous format such that XML.jl has a clear identity, much like CSV.jl

discussion.author: joshday
discussion.text:
I'm developing a KML (https://developers.google.com/kml) package that depends on XML.jl.  Is this ready to be registered?

p.s. A big thank you to all General maintainers!
